website_summaries.verdict: Duffel diaper bag gives you a great look. Offers multiple pockets to keep your gear organized.
pros: Large size of diaper bag that can hold all of your gear
Stylish gray and white bag ships with a matching changing pad
Has extra padding on the shoulder strap with an adjustable length
Comes with stroller straps that you can remove when not needed
cons: Light colors on the diaper bag will show dirt and grime clearly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a mom-to-be
customer_reviews.text: The mother-to-be picked this out for her diaper bag and was thrilled when she got it. I have to say, though, it was much cheaper on Amazon than the big Baby Box stores. She's happy, I'm happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sporter

customer_reviews.title: Kind of small but is very functional
customer_reviews.text: While the bag itself is very cute and has lots of pockets, it is very small and I'm thinking I may have to buy another one before the baby gets here.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Bird

customer_reviews.title: The quality and functionality are terrific.
customer_reviews.text: We use this diaper bag every day, and I have no complaints. The quality and functionality are terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I love my diaper bag! It is cute for a mom with a little girl and it matches everything I have for her! It has a lot of pockets and the changing pad is great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylea Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag. Big enough to fit all our needs & I love how many different pockets it has inside and outside of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, my daughter really liked it
customer_reviews.text: The diaper bag was just as pictured. Very nice, my daughter really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: nerak

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient diaper bag. Lots of pockets and room
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this at her baby shower. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a nice bag very roomy lots of pockets and storage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my granddaughter's new baby. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrsshopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice extra large diaper that can fit everything I need for myself and the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and roomy bag. Includes a clear plastic zipper bag to throw in clothes when there's an accident. Overall it's what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. I wanted a big bag that was durable and this bag is both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Gray and White Chevron Deluxe Duffle Diaper Bag
product_meta.description: Form meets ultimate function and space with the Deluxe Duffle Diaper Bag by Trend Lab. The Deluxe Duffle is spacious enough for parents with multiple children and features several organizational pockets, a durable wipe-off exterior, sophisticated style, and extreme versatility. The Deluxe Duffle is made from durable black and gray chevron Polyester and has an attractive gray lining. Black top handle straps in addition to the black adjustable and removable shoulder strap allow for handy carrying versatility. Removable stroller straps can also be used for easy attachment to the stroller. Duffle features a zippered top closure with 4 spacious exterior zippered pockets, 2 exterior side bottle pockets, 6 interior organizational pockets, and an interior zippered pocket. Set includes a coordinating changing pad and a clear "dirty duds" zippered pouch.
feature_bullets: Set includes a coordinating changing pad and a clear "dirty duds" zippered pouch
